comments:
switched from eclipse 3.1.1 to 3.2m4 with cdt 3.0.1.
if the c++ indexer (fulltext, if it matters) runs a window opens saying "multiple errors have occured".
it contains several lines (and more are added whilke the indexer progresses) saying 
"Update Progress (Time of Error: [respective date here])".
there's a button "Details" but the deitails are always nothing than "Error" which is not very helpful.
it is not really possible to close that window -- it pops up again immediately and there's no option to send it to the background.

the log contains for every error (Index and Size change):
